meanings.definition: A place where clothes and linens are washed and dried.
meanings.sent1: I went to the launderettes to wash my dirty clothes.
meanings.sent2: Many people in the neighborhood use the launderettes to clean their linens.
meanings.sent3: The launderettes were so busy that I had to wait for a machine to become available.
meanings.sent4: The launderettes hummed with the sound of washing machines and dryers.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the launderettes made it feel like daytime even at night.

meanings.definition: The act of washing and drying clothes and linens at a public facility.
meanings.sent1: Doing my laundry at the launderettes saved me time at home.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the convenience of using launderettes over hand-washing her clothes.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd enjoy a trip to the launderettes, but here I am!
meanings.sent4: The launderettes became my go-to spot for getting my clothes clean in a pinch.
meanings.sent5: The smell of detergent filled the air at the launderettes, reminding me of home.
